minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: I think we need to address both customer acquisition & sales pipeline and market strategy & competition analysis today.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your accuracy is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: We're facing similar API integration challenges. Let's share learnings.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: The Series A timeline is tight, but we're confident about SaaS metrics.

minutes.speaker: Anita Krishnan
minutes.text: Don't scale too early. Make sure your latency is solid first.

minutes.speaker: Arjun Vasanth
minutes.text: Well, I think... our model drift is showing 90% accuracy, and the SAM is improving.

minutes.speaker: Rohan Mehta
minutes.text: Fundraising is tough right now. How's your runway extension progress?
